html:
satisfied. Not disappointed. We have not an impotent Father, or a disappointed Christ, or a defeated Holy Spirit, as is so commonly preached; but anomnipotent Father, anall-victorious Christ, and analmighty Holy Spirit, able to break the hardest heart and subdue the stoutest will.

by His knowledge, &c. Punctuate:"Satisfied by His knowledge, My righteous Servant shall justify many, for He shall bear" , &c.
